names.bio: Abbey Lee is known for her work as a fashion model and actress. She appeared in two Victoria's Secret Fashion shows in 2008 and 2009. Donaldson appeared on the cover or been featured in many international fashion magazines including Vogue, Numero, Muse, Dazed and Confused, V and W among others. She has been in campaigns for Calvin Klein, Saint Laurent, Versaci, Gucci, Fendi, Donna Karan, Hugo Boss among others. She acted in several notable films including Ruben Guthrie (2014), Mad Max: Fury Road (2015), Gods of Egypt (2016), Neon Demon (2016) and Office Christmas Party (2016). She was born Abbey Lee Kershaw on June 12, 1987 in Melbourne, Australia and grew up in Kennsington, Australia. She was discovered at age eighteen while at the beach in Sydney, Australia by Chic Management's Kathy Ward.
names.name: Abbey Lee

filmography.title: The Five Wives: So Shiny, So Chrome
